participant_1.background:
I wear my boots as little as possible.
my father is a retired police officer.
My family and I are close because we are all in on the joke.
I was bullied for being overweight as a child.
i want to own a house on a beach.

participant_2.background:
I fear that I will lose my pets, because they are the only ones who truly understand me.
that way , after graduating , i can teach english there for a year or two.
I get along with my family well.
i still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.
My spouse is a doctor who works long hours, but they always make time for me and our dog.

content.text: It's going pretty well, I'm just on my way to class.
I'm studying English literature, I'm hoping to teach English in another country after I graduate.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to travel abroad.
It's a great experience, I definitely recommend it.
What's your favorite thing about traveling?
I love meeting new people and learning about different cultures.
Me too! I also love trying new foods.
Me too! I love trying new foods, especially when they're local to the area.
What's the most interesting food you've ever tried?
I once tried a dish made with alligator, it was pretty good.
Wow, I've never tried alligator before.
It's not too bad, it tastes kind of like chicken.
I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to try it, but I'm sure it's good if you like chicken.
You should give it a try! You might be surprised.
Maybe I will, thanks for the recommendation!
